metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5557 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the tracker-miners package. A weakness in the sandbox allows a maliciously-crafted file to execute code outside the sandbox if the tracker-extract process has first been compromised by a separate vulnerability.

notes.Note: sbeattie> seccomp sandbox escape, requires an additional vulnerability to take advantage of it mdeslaur> Incomplete fix in 3.3.2, better fix in 3.3.3 Incomplete fix in 3.4.5, better fix in 3.4.6 Sandbox confinement in focal and earlier is considerably different, we will not be backporting this fix to focal and earlier since this is simply a hardening measure, and does not represent an actual vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tracker-miners: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
